verses.verse: Lord,<WH136> you have been our dwelling place<WH4583> for all<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>

Before the mountains<WH2022> were brought forth,<WH3205> before you had formed<WH2342> the earth<WH776> and the world,<WH8398> even from everlasting<WH5769> to<WH5704> everlasting,<WH5769> you are God.<WH410>
You turn<WH7725> man<WH582> to destruction,<WH1793> saying,<WH7725> "Return, you children<WH1121> of men.<WH120>"
For a thousand<WH505> years<WH8141> in your sight<WH5869> are just like<WH3117> yesterday<WH865> when it is past,<WH5674> like a watch<WH821> in the night.<WH3915>
You sweep<WH2229> them away as they sleep.<WH8142> In the morning<WH1242> they sprout<WH2498> like new grass.<WH2682>
In the morning<WH1242> it sprouts<WH6692> and springs up.<WH2498> By evening,<WH6153> it is withered<WH3001> and dry.<WH4135>
For we are consumed<WH3615> in your anger.<WH639> We are troubled<WH926> in your wrath.<WH2534>
You have set<WH7896> our iniquities<WH5771> before you,<WH5956> our secret sins in the light<WH3974> of your presence.<WH6440>
For all our days<WH3117> have passed away<WH6437> in your wrath.<WH5678> We bring<WH3615> our years<WH8141> to an end as a sigh.<WH1899>

The days<WH3117> of our years<WH8141> are seventy,<WH7657> <WH7657> <WH8141> or even by reason of strength<WH1369> eighty<WH8084> years;<WH8141> yet their pride<WH7296> is but labor<WH5999> and sorrow,<WH205> for it passes<WH1468> quickly,<WH2440> and we fly away.<WH5774>
Who knows<WH3045> the power<WH5797> of your anger,<WH639> your wrath<WH5678> according to the fear that is due to you?<WH3374>
So teach<WH3045> us to number<WH4487> our days,<WH3117> that we may gain<WH935> a heart<WH3824> of wisdom.<WH2451>
Relent,<WH7725> Yahweh!<WH3068> How long?<WH5162> Have compassion on your servants!<WH5650>
Satisfy<WH7646> us in the morning<WH1242> with your loving kindness,<WH2617> that we may rejoice<WH7442> and be glad<WH8055> all our days.<WH3117>
Make us glad<WH8055> for as many days<WH3117> as you have afflicted<WH6031> us,<WH8141> for as many years as we have seen<WH7200> evil.<WH7451>
Let your work<WH6467> appear<WH7200> to your servants;<WH5650> your glory<WH1926> to their children.<WH1121>
Let the favor<WH5278> of the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> be on us;<WH3559> establish the work<WH4639> of our hands<WH3027> for us;<WH3559> yes, establish the work<WH4639> of our hands.<WH3027>
